item.title: How to Embed the GeoGebra Calculator App in a Hugo Static Site
item.description: How to embed interactive geometry demos in Hugo static sites.

item.title: Write a First Person Game in 2KB With Rust
item.description: Learn about ray casting and discover some fun math by creating a tiny 2KB game with Rust.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a programmer from Salt Lake City, Utah, United States. This site is mostly about programming, but I also like hiking, running, and camping. Tools # Case Software Text Editor Helix Terminal Emulator Alacritty Linux Distro Arch Linux Desktop Environment Sway Case Language Desktop Applications Rust / GTK Web Applications Svelte / Typescript / Tailwindcss Contact # Github: grantshandy Email: granthandy@proton.me Discord: gsh#5620

item.title: Showcase
item.description: Wasm4 Playground # Wasm4 Playground is a website that allows you to write, play, and share WASM-4 retro games. The site works by bundling the AssemblyScript and Roland compilers which compile your source code into portable .wasm files. The site then runs your game in a modified version of the WASM-4 runtime which automatically reloads when you click “Apply Changes”. View Github Page Visit Site Gemway # Gemway is a little HTTP-Gemini proxy I threw together in a night.
